sessionSummary: Confirmed main is up-to-date and post-merge green; added a repeatable handoff procedure + post-merge status report and a next-agent orientation runbook focused on producing a real end-to-end artifact run.

decisions.decision: Treat 'effective results' as a real artifact run
decisions.rationale: Green unit tests and smoke tests are necessary but not sufficient; the project needs a reproducible ComfyUI+LLM run whose outputs are validated and visible in the UI.
alternatives: Only rely on unit tests/fixtures and postpone real-service validation

currentState.status: Pipeline/FLF2V/toggles merged; awaiting live E2E artifacts

nextSteps: Write a new root-level AGENT_HANDOFF capturing run evidence
blockers: Live ComfyUI/LM Studio availability for a real generation run
openQuestions: What is the preferred LM Studio endpoint for local development (the helper defaults may not match current machines)?
